Not true.  If I hadn't received a notice from Comcast, then I never would have posted the information here. Not trying to scare others into not downloading, just giving some advice based on what I have recently experienced.

The copyright owner has identified the Internet Protocol ('IP') address associated with your Service account at the time as the source of the infringing works.  The works identified by the copyright owner in its notification are listed below.  Comcast reminds you that use of the Service (or any part of the Service) in any manner that constitutes an infringement of any copyrighted work is a violation of Comcast's Acceptable Use Policy and may result in the suspension or termination of your Service account.
